name: Sort Text
description:
Have you wanted to just automatically sort the lines of text in your document? Well now you can! With the new and improve “Sort Text” plugin from Submersible Industries. Simplify install this plugin in Figma, and start automatically sorting your text like a rockstar!


Go from this


  • Zukini
  • Coconuts
  • Apples
  • Bananas


To this


  • Apples
  • Bananas
  • Coconuts
  • Zukini


In a click of a button! Get started today.


Created with love, by Ryan Munro.
